==== About Me ====

About Me is effectively just an evolution contact page for info on yourself.  This has a more practical use on mobile computers as it can contain details about how to return the device to you.

'''Tests to perform'''

** Input your details.
** Reopen and edit some of them.
** Change your password.
** Select and Set a picture.
** Reopen and change it back.
